ValidationRule.description: This will prevent users form changing the Owner when the Contact is Protected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , Protected_Contact__c = true, PRIORVALUE(OwnerId ) <> $User.Id , NOT($Profile.Name= "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name= "Origination Manager"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Owner cannot be changed on a Protected Contact. Only the current Owner or Originations Manager can update the Owner of this record.
